<lb/>AVAILABLE PUBLICATIONS<lb/>
<lb/>Digital Publications<lb/>
<lb/>The following publications are available without charge through the website of<lb/>
the Bibliographical Society of the University of Virginia,<lb/>
http://www.bsuva.org<lb/>
Studies in Bibliography, vols. 1–60, with Cumulative Table of Contents.<lb/>
de Montluzin, Emily Lorraine, Attributions of Authorship in the European<lb/>
Magazine, 1782–1826.<lb/>
de Montluzin, Emily Lorraine, Attributions of Authorship in the Gentleman’s<lb/>
Magazine, 1731–1868: An Electronic Union List.<lb/>
Evans, G. Blakemore, ed., Shakespearean Prompt-Books of the Seventeenth<lb/>
Century, vols. 1–8.<lb/>
Hailey, J. Carter, A Catalog of Paperstocks in the Shakespearian Pavier Quar-<lb/>
tos (1619).<lb/>
Neavill, Gordon B., A Bibliography of The Modern Library: 1925–1959.<lb/>
Ray, Gordon N., Illustrations for The Art Deco Book in France.<lb/>
Print Publications<lb/>
Studies in Bibliography<lb/>
The latest volume of Studies in Bibliography is available at $70.00 a<lb/>
copy from the University of Virginia Press, PO Box 400318, Charlottesville<lb/>
VA 22904-4318; E-mail. Many back issues are available for sale from the Execu-<lb/>
tive Secretary of the Society.<lb/>
Other Society Publications<lb/>
The Society’s print publications, except Studies in Bibliography, are dis-<lb/>
tributed by Oak Knoll Books of New Castle, Delaware. Orders for Society publica-<lb/>
tions may be placed online at www.oakknoll.com or sent to: Oak Knoll Books,<lb/>
310 Delaware Street, New Castle DE 19720; Phone 1-800-996-2556 or<lb/>
Fax (302) 328-7274; E-mail oakknoll@oakknoll.com. Society members who<lb/>
identify themselves as such at the time of ordering will receive a 10% discount.<lb/>
Bidwell, John. Paper and Type: Bibliographical Essays (2019). $55.00<lb/>
Boughn, Michael. H. D.: A Bibliography, 1905–1990 (1993). $39.50.<lb/>
Bowers, Fredson. Essays in Bibliography, Text, and Editing (2nd printing, 2003).<lb/>
$70.00.<lb/>
Bowers, Fredson. Principles of Bibliographical Description (reprint, 2023).<lb/>
$39.95.<lb/>
Bristol, Roger P. Supplement to Charles Evans’ American Bibliography and Index to Supplement to Evans’ American Bibliography (1970; 1971). $70.00.<lb/>
